GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: fix overflow on MIN_I64 definition

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 0a4fddc95c63fa5460f778885965281360fc3d90. For more details please see the references link.
